author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 14, 2015
text: Wednesday on the NewsHour, violence and tension surge in Israel. Also: The winners of the first Democratic debate, Supreme Court Justice Stephen Breyer discusses his new book, Ta-Nehisi Coates and his take on race relations, California's sequoias suffer from the state’s historic drought, one man’s mission to protect Congo’s gorillas and the Sartorialist offers his take on the power of fashion.
